programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep28
programme.desc: Big Busyness / Foam Party - When Leaf meets an ambitious Coffee Bean, he learns the highs and lows of business. / Everyone is mad at Rocksy so she tries to make it up to them by creating fun foam for them to play in. But when they get preoccupied and forget about Rocksy, it’s her turn to become mad at them.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep89
programme.desc: Slugsy Won't Slide - Slugsy has put too much slime on his slide and is terrified of sliding off it. Can the other tots help him overcome his fear?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep90
programme.desc: Flowertot Taxi - Stingo is sure he is on to a good thing when he decides to start up a taxi service using… slug power! Slugsy is soon exhausted and unable to keep up with the demand

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep91
programme.desc: Fifi's Happy Day - Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep92
programme.desc: Fly High Primrose - Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep37
programme.desc: How Can We Hide To Watch Butterflies? - JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders “how can we hide to watch butterflies?” That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep38
programme.desc: How Can I Go Faster Than Joey And Jinx? - It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. “How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?” Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going ‘Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep39
programme.desc: What Shall We Have For Our Harvest Breakfast? - It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, “What shall we have for our harvest breakfast?” That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. “What about something chewy” suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry – until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep40
programme.desc: What Hat Should Mimi Wear? - Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear – the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Olivia Ep37
programme.desc: Olivia Visits The Aquarium - On a school trip to the aquarium, Olivia and her classmates compete to be the first to view all the exhibits and win a chance to help feed the sea-lions. Olivia is partnered with Francine, and the two girls have to reconcile their different approaches in order to win the prize.

programme.title: Olivia Ep38
programme.desc: Olivia And The Anniversary Surprise - It's Olivia's parents' anniversary, and they're planning a night out at a special restaurant. When they can't find a babysitter, Grandma happily volunteers. When Olivia suggests they all surprise Mum and Dad at dinner, she discovers the restaurant isn't at all the way she imagined, but it's a lot more fun!

programme.title: Olivia Ep39
programme.desc: Olivia Paints A Mural - Olivia is inspired after a visit to the museum with her family, and decides she's going to become a great painter herself. She gets right down to business, painting a portrait of Ian. When she sees a mural painting on a building wall, she wonders if she'll ever find a space big enough for her big ideas!

programme.title: Olivia Ep40
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Ducklings - After a fun day at the park, Olivia and Ian return home with some unexpected visitors – a mother duck and her ducklings! The harder Olivia and Ian try to keep he ducks a secret from Mother and Father, the more household mischief they all seem to get into.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep37
programme.desc: Why Bees Sting - You see there was a time when Bees didn't sting. All the animals loved the Bees and they especially loved their sweet and yummy honey. The trouble was all the precious honey was disappearing and there was a honey crisis in Tinga Tinga. Something had to be done. Luckily clever old Tortoise has a cunning plan. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep38
programme.desc: Why Peacock Struts - You see there was a time when Peacock didn't strut. He was a very proud bird and he wanted to be the best at everything. He wanted to be the best bird-brain in Tinga Tinga. He wanted to be the best flyer in Tinga Tinga and he wanted to have the biggest and the best tail in Tinga Tinga…. But as Lion so wisely points out ‘Sometimes it's not good to get everything you want!' Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep39
programme.desc: Why Aardvark Has A Sticky Tongue - You see there was a time when Aardvark didn't have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep40
programme.desc: Why Whale Spouts - You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep61
programme.desc: The Great Stink - When a god awful stench pours forth from the portal, Puss and company must deal with the vomit inducing consequences

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesn’t sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces “fast food” to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep35
programme.desc: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares - When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep9
programme.desc: Dog the Right Thing - In preparation for the big race to determine the next Race Cadets, Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to build their own cars. The catch? The car parts are scattered throughout Pawston. \ The Not Yet Cadets compete in the final race to see which team will join the Race Cadets.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep9
programme.desc: Home Alone - Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of The Mystery Artist - There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again – and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep35
programme.desc: Crazy Maze / Super Sneaks - Archibald and Sage enter an endurance race through the corn maze to end all corn mazes. / Thinking his new sneakers have made him super-fast, Archibald gets roped into delivering ice cream for a couple of new-to-town entrepreneurs.

programme.desc: Night Of The Living Croods / Spoonful Of Soo-Gar - When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi's Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep41
programme.desc: What’S Happened To My Little Tree? - Jess shows us his little tree: a beautiful flowering shrub in full bloom. He tells us that his little tree didn't always look like this...there was a time when the tree's leaves turned yellow! What's happening to my little tree? That's the Big Question! Jess asks Mimi for help, but she's in bed with a bad cold. She's drinking lots of fluids to help make her better. Jess gives his little tree some more water to help make it better but when he goes to check on his tree the next day the leaves have turned brown and crinkly! Baa and Billie come along - Billie is tucked in the brim of Baa's woolly hat, it's too cold for her to come out. Jess wonders if his little tree is cold and needs warming up. So he wraps a potato sack round the little tree. But the next day things are even worse the leaves are falling off.! And it's happening all over Greendale Farm! Jess goes to see Horace who is busy composing a new song. It's all about the Seasons. Jess finally realises that what's happening to his tree is perfe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep42
programme.desc: How Can We All Keep Cool? - It's the day of Mimi's dance in Jess's barn but its too hot to move, let alone dance. Jess wonders how they can all keep cool! That's the BIG QUESTION. Jess asks his friends for ideas. Horace keeps cool by swimming under water, but that's no good for Jess and everyone else who can't swim. The puppies keep cool by panting, but that just makes Jess even hotter and out of breath. And Willow keeps cool by standing very still. That won't work for a dance, they can't all keep still! Mimi comes past holding a little fan which makes a lovely cool breeze. Jess realises that what they need is a giant fan that could make a cool breeze in the barn. He and Mimi make a huge fan which Horace works as part of his one-man band. Everyone has a great time dancing and keeping cool. Jess has answered the Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep106
programme.desc: 123's with Blue - Count along with Josh & Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to find out what Blue wants to buy at the store. We help Shovel & Pail learn who has more graham crackers then help Josh discover what he can buy with his Blue dollars.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft - he must be rescued from an out of control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Cosmic Circus/A Hole Lot of Trouble - Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster/Winter Lights - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Paddington and the Wardrobe / Paddington Helps with Homework - Paddington is accidentally delivered inside a wardrobe to Mr. Curry's house and must get out before he is discovered. // Paddington tries to help Judy with her geography homework and ends up being the subject of it.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Show and Smell - Bossy and Turtle bring fun and weird smelling food for "Show and Smell".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Don't Look Now - During a sleepover Bossy and Turtle watch a scary movie but may have bitten off more than they can chew.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Dr. Abuela - When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Driving Force - When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they’ll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep524
programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602

programme.desc: Space Guppies! - When the evil robot Major Bummer tries to eliminate music from the galaxy, pop Princess Molly joins forces with sci-fi versions of the Guppies to restore peace, harmony, and melody! Will they reach the Bubblestar - a space station speaker - in time?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep108

programme.desc: Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Song Time with Blue - It's a music filled day at the Blue's Clues house as we try to figure out what song Blue wants to sing. On the way, we help Josh & Blue identify sounds of musical instruments and help chicks from the farm with their song show.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Honey Bear - When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Science Pair - Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Center of a Tension - Bossy and Turtle have their first sleepover ever.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Kitty Cat Caper - Bonnie's cat tricks the crew into thinking he's a good pirate, but then they realize he's actually after their treasure.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of “Super Bouncy Tires,” he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Fired Up! - When Blaze smells smoke at Axle City’s garage, he calmly and courageously leads his friends outside to safety. Axle City’s fire chief is impressed with Blaze’s courage and thinks maybe he has what it takes to be a fire fighter.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Shark Strength - When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Bubble Baby! - Molly's going to have a new sibling, and the Guppies are excited about babies! At the end of the day, the kids go to the hospital to meet the new baby!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Growing with Blue - Come along as Josh, Blue and our friends learn that everything grows in different ways like fruits, vegetables, even you and Blue too! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what game Blue wants to play outside today.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Getting Glasses with Magenta - It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep214
programme.desc: The Kitty Cat Caper - Bonnie's cat tricks the crew into thinking he's a good pirate, but then they realize he's actually after their treasure.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Dr. Abuela - When Barbarito steals Doctora Abuela's ship and traps Santi and his crew, Tina and Abuela must save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Cart-tastrophe - Bossy schemes to get Turtle new Boom Boom Super Satang cards.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Way of the Gran-Gran - Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep83
programme.desc: What's Your Name? - The Teletubbies enjoy a game of 'What's your name?' Later, there's a surprise when a bowl of Tubby Custard joins in with the game!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Bath - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bath' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different baths - a baby bath, a bubble bath, a bird bath and even a banana bath!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Sunflower Beanstalk - One of Logi-Po's plants has grown too big for the HQ... and it's still growing...

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep14
programme.desc: It's time to visit the library - When JoJo runs out of story-books to read, she visits the Library with Gran Gran and gets her own library card! JoJo learns all about the Library and discovers how amazing it is!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Incredible Kazoops - Monty discovers he is the only one in the family who can't whistle, but wonders if with practice you can perfect anything.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Star Yeti - Jeanie wishes she were a famous pop star, but Monty wonders if being famous would really be as great as his sister thinks.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Spy Game - When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep35
programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell. But what is a sense? Time for the Squirrels to learn about the five senses and earn their Senses Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep34
programme.desc: The Comic Badge - Duggee is reading the Squirrels one of his favourite comics. They eagerly want to know the ending, but the comic was discontinued. Luckily Duggee has the comic badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep33
programme.desc: The Babysitting Badge - Duggee has a job to do outside of the Clubhouse. But who will look after the Squirrels? King Tiger of course, he has his Babysitting Badge. But then the Squirrels end up babysitting King Tiger!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Middle of the World City: Ecuador - After hearing about how the Monument to the Equator is in the wrong location, Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters and move the monument onto the equator.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers - When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's loyal Grimbots steal the pole's marker to help Glitch win.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Bob Bilby - When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Bike - Bluey is struggling to learn how to ride her bike. But as she and Dad watch her friends determination with their own tasks, Bluey is inspired to give it another try.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Andy and the Sooty Tern - Andy heads to the Galapagos Islands in search of a seabird called a sooty tern. Along the way, he meets a fish called a trevally that leaps out of the water trying to catch birds.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Teeny Tiny Creatures S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Little Owls - Chantelle and her friends try to spot some little owls, whilst Rory meets a bird expert.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Pirates Rock - Having discovered some stones on the beach, Cook and Line form a rock band, much to the annoyance of Captain Sinker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep31
programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style after hearing a famous bird quartet singing in a nearby tree.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep30
programme.desc: The Topiary Badge - When the Squirrels see Duggee practicing his impressive Topiary skills they are keen to try some of their own - and promptly put their new talents into practice in order to tame some very wild woods!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep29
programme.desc: The Favourite Badge - The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding what their own favourite things are, so they make a film asking some of their friends what is special to them to help narrow it down.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep5
programme.desc: The Continent of Europe - When Tala bases her class project on her uncle's travels, the Go Jetters swing into action and help Grandmaster Glitch take his own souvenir selfies across the continent of Europe.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Continent of Africa - Glitch takes Tala to the continent of Africa to help her with an Academy project. When the pair get lost, the Go Jetters need to crack the clues and find them in this huge continent.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep20
programme.desc: Merry Misty Island - Dash, Bash and Ferdinand decide to throw a Christmas party.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Duck's Quack - Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop when Duck loses his quack.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Paisley Sea - The duo think they are heading to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Cooking Up a Storm - Nelly and Nora have to get everything indoors before the big storm arrives.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Dog Loves Camping - Dog and Pug decide to go holiday and use Granny Pug's guide to camping. They visit a music festival, a jungle and they go to the top of a mountain.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Tasty Trip - After seeing an advertisement for the World Food Festival, Monty wonders if there are ways to explore the world other than travelling.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep41
programme.desc: The Thing That Ruled - The Dinopaws meet REX who says that he is the ruler of the world, but they learn otherwise.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep66
programme.desc: Construction Obstruction - A Blocker can't do his job without his tools, but he can't get his tools to his job.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep65
programme.desc: The Wind In Her Sails - Sailor Po can't sail her yacht unless Team Tinpo can find some wind for her sails.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Mum School - Bluey plays mum to a brood of bouncy balloons, including an irrepressible floater named Greenie. But she soon discovers that mothering is much harder than she imagined.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep28
programme.desc: The Round Up Badge - The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and his old pal Rodeo Horse, who teaches them how to be cowhands... and earn their Round Up Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep27
programme.desc: The Game Show Badge - The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them by putting on a Game Show, with some help hosting from his good friend Ladybug.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep26
programme.desc: The Puddle Badge - Happy sets his sights on a very questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in, much to the horror of Duggee and the other Squirrels - and the tiny citizens of Midgetropolis who live inside it!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Monteverde Cloud Forest, Costa Rica - A feather duster drama unfolds high in the Monteverde Cloud Forest when Glitch's feather collecting goes wrong. Can the Go Jetters save a rare bird's nest and find a lost trophy?

programme.desc: Fatberg, London Sewers, England - While Lars, Kelly and Xuli go into the sewers to help keep London clean, Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes down the toilet.

programme.desc: Never Fear, Nimbin's Here! - Nimbin has a dream, and believes that it's a warning for Champer. She promises to guard him all day long.

programme.title: The Drum Ep125
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel sharing a range of perspectives. Presented by Julia Baird.

programme.title: ABC News Ep195
programme.desc: News from where you live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Mary Gearin (Fri-Sat).

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 18 - Melbourne v Brisbane Lions Ep102
programme.desc: Third versus fourth in a game that could decide the Top 4. The Lions have won four in a row and have two more wins than the 4th placed Demons. Can Brisbane win at the MCG and gain a crucial advantage 6 weeks out from finals?

programme.title: The World Ep140
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: China Tonight Ep12
programme.desc: In the season final, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the football scandal ruining the beautiful game in China, and too hot to handle - the great chilli off with celebrity chef Adam Liaw.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Shoalhaven Heads NSW: The Thorleys Ep36
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Will it be the charm of an old beach shack or a modern home with all the mod cons that wins over house hunters Graham and Kim? Presenter Simon Marnie accompanies the retirees as they inspect four Shoalhaven properties.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Forces of Nature - Fire Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Blazes fuelled by wind, dry bush and weather can consume everything in their path. Aaron Pedersen explains how nowhere on Earth burns with quite the same intensity and ferocity as Australia - or as regularly.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Main Event - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions
programme.desc: Heavyweights - Earning a submission victory inside the famed UFC Octagon takes skills and talent that few possess. UFC Ultimate Submissions brings you a collection of the greatest grappling finishes the MMA world has ever seen.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2317
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Motul TT Assen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2317
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez is an upcoming event headlined by a featherweight title fight between champion Alexander Volkanovski and challenger Yair Rodriguez. Volkanovski, a dominant force in the division, aims to defend his title for the fifth time and solidify his legacy. Rodriguez, known for his unorthodox striking style, seeks to claim the featherweight championship and make a statement. The event promises an exciting fight card with compelling matchups across different weight classes, delivering a night of thrilling mixed martial arts action

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Main Event - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: 2023 Shark Grand Prix de France Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The French city and circuit of Le Mans are synonymous with motorsport - having hosted two and four wheel races and endurance events for many years. Le Mans first held a motorcycle Grand Prix event in 1969, when the great Giacomo Agostini won the 500cc race, lapping all the other riders on his MV Agusta. The modern circuit has been a permanent fixture on the MotoGP™ calendar since 2000. Local French fans are knowledgeable and passionate about their racing, with a boisterous atmosphere at races. French riders of different eras and in different classes such as Johann Zarco, Christian Sarron, Olivier Jacque, Arnaud Vincent, Guy Bertin, Randy de Puniet and Mike Di Meglio have brought their country race wins and titles, adding to France’s significant racing heritage.

programme.title: UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC 290: Volkanovski vs. Rodriguez is an upcoming event headlined by a featherweight title fight between champion Alexander Volkanovski and challenger Yair Rodriguez. Volkanovski, a dominant force in the division, aims to defend his title for the fifth time and solidify his legacy. Rodriguez, known for his unorthodox striking style, seeks to claim the featherweight championship and make a statement. The event promises an exciting fight card with compelling matchups across different weight classes, delivering a night of thrilling mixed martial arts action
